title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.2 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations

No person shall bring or have present an animal on the
fairgrounds during a fair which is not qualified under the provisions of this

Part. No person shall present an interstate or intrastate certificate of
veterinary inspection that has been altered by anyone other than the issuing
veterinarian or an authorized agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
351.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
